caption.title: Anomalies in ocean temperature and nitrate in the Santa Barbara Channel.
caption.p: Monthly anomalies in ( a) bottom temperature at 7–10 m depth and ( c) bottom nitrate concentrations at 7–10 m depth. Occurrence and duration of ( b) heatwaves defined as five or more consecutive days when the mean bottom temperature was warmer than the 90th percentile and ( d) low nitrate events lasting at least 21 days with mean daily bottom nitrate concentrations<1 μmol l −1. The anomalously warm years of 2014–2015 are shown in red.
